p.d:
Leslie i Margo imaju novosti o svojim vezama, a dok se Louisa i Spiros zbližavaju, u grad dolazi cirkus.
Uloge: Keeley Hawes, Josh O'Connor, Milo Parker, Callum Woodhouse, Daisy Waterstone, Alexis Georgoulis, Barbara Flynn, Anna Savva, Yorgos Karamihos Scenarist: Simon Nye Redatelji: Roger Goldby, Niall MacCormick Proizvodnja: Sid Gentle Films Ltd za ITV
